# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a tooltip interaction object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

A tooltip interaction object.

## Creating a tooltip interaction

- **init(defaultToolTip:)**: Creates a tooltip interaction object and sets the default tooltip text.
